entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
